LanguageData.BroodLord.label: brood lord
LanguageData.BroodLord.description: A massive and lumbering alien beast capable of rending steel and biting through concrete. It is EXTREMELY dangerous and is best dealt with using explosives and AT weapons, or better-yet landmines.
LanguageData.Bulwark.label: bulwark
LanguageData.Bulwark.description: A massive and lumbering alien beast capable of rending steel and biting through concrete. It is EXTREMELY dangerous and is best dealt with using explosives and AT weapons, or better-yet landmines.
LanguageData.Harvester.label: harvester
LanguageData.Harvester.description: A large carnivorous monster that attacks at night and attempts to drag off a living victim... One can only wonder what the motives of such a creature might be.
LanguageData.Prowler.label: prowler
LanguageData.Prowler.description: A huge and muscular monstrosity that is fiercely territorial and very aggressive. Seems to lack any greater sense of self preservation
LanguageData.Terrorworm.label: terrorworm
LanguageData.Terrorworm.description: An alien (or at least unknown) worm. It is large enough to pose a threat to a human, however they do not seem incredibly fast or ferocious They are often accompanied by other Horrors and seem to have a supporting role in the hive.
LanguageData.Visceral.label: visceral
LanguageData.Visceral.description: An alien (or at least unknown) creature of rigor and veracity. About the size of a human and much more dangerous. Armed with rending raptorial legs and a maw capable of tearing into even the toughest hide.
